sentences.english: It will generate randomised latitude-longitude pairs at irregular intervals.

sentences.english: The optical theodolite can be used in measuring the shape and position of a super - big workpiece.

sentences.english: The latitude and longitude system is probably the best known way to designate geographic coordinates.

definition: Classical Chinese name for planet Venus in the east before dawn
(used in names of people and shops, symbolizing prosperity)
clear/vast and deep/classifier for a body of clear water
